channel.title: Help with my server!
channel.description: Hello, can someone give me some help with my server? I cant give mod or staff to myself or other people. Ive already tried in the data paste, of my server [Hiyascape v2]. People play at my server, so theres no control like banning. Thanks for help :) [br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 30, 2008, 03:33:10 PM[/size][hr]Up :(

item.title: Help with my server!
item.dc:creator: @adamator5 adamator5
item.description:
@adamator5 wrote:

you go in your server, open the characters file, click on your name (or the person you wann give admin or mod and where it says player rights, change the number
mod = 1
admin = 2
owner = 3
coder = 4

Read full topic
